# Total crossings: 17
# Upward crossings: 9
# Downward crossings: 8

# Disk crossing detected when y2 (secondary BH y-coordinate) crosses 0
#
# Column format (6 columns):
# 1: crossing_id - Sequential crossing number
# 2: time_before[years] - Time just before crossing
# 3: time_after[years] - Time just after crossing
# 4: direction - 'up' (y: - -> +) or 'down' (y: + -> -)
# 5: y2_before - y2 coordinate before crossing
# 6: y2_after - y2 coordinate after crossing
#
